@graph.headline: [CASE STUDY] Rave Fashion Store Leverages Tag Pages For Clicks
@graph.description: A comprehensive case study showing how a rave apparel Shopify store improved organic traffic through strategic tag page optimization and collection page SEO over two years.

@graph.name: [CASE STUDY] Rave Fashion Store Leverages Tag Pages For Clicks

itemListElement.name: Case Study: Shopify Tag Page SEO

@graph.name: How to Optimize Shopify Tag Pages for SEO
@graph.description: Step-by-step process for leveraging tag pages to create sub-collection silos and improve organic traffic

step.name: Technical SEO Foundation
step.text: Implement basic technical changes including URL structure amendments, nofollow tags for social links, H tag optimization, and site speed improvements

step.name: Collection Page Optimization
step.text: Optimize collection pages with unique H1 tags, SEO titles, and URL strings. Add relevant content and FAQ sections below product grids

step.name: Create Sub-Collection Silos
step.text: Leverage tag pages using Optizen app to create editable sub-collections with unique content and meta information

step.name: Implement Internal Linking
step.text: Create structured internal linking through breadcrumbs, filters, and body content to semantically relate collections to sub-collections

step.name: Monitor and Scale
step.text: Track performance through Google Search Console and continue building out additional tag pages and collection silos

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify SEO
hasDefinedTerm.description: Search engine optimization techniques specifically applied to Shopify ecommerce platforms

hasDefinedTerm.name: Tag Page Optimization
hasDefinedTerm.description: The process of optimizing product tag pages to create indexable sub-collection pages that rank in search engines

hasDefinedTerm.name: Collection Pages
hasDefinedTerm.description: Shopify pages that group related products together, serving as category pages for SEO purposes

hasDefinedTerm.name: Sub-Collection Silos
hasDefinedTerm.description: Hierarchical page structure created using tag pages to organize products into more granular categories

hasDefinedTerm.name: Organic Traffic Growth
hasDefinedTerm.description: Increase in website visitors from unpaid search engine results

hasDefinedTerm.name: Ecommerce SEO
hasDefinedTerm.description: Search engine optimization strategies specifically designed for online retail websites

@graph.name: Rave Fashion Store
@graph.description: European-based Shopify store selling rave outfits and apparel with worldwide shipping

@graph.name: Optizen
@graph.description: Digital agency and app developer specializing in Shopify SEO solutions

makesOffer.name: Shopify SEO Consulting and Tag Page Optimization

@graph.name: Optizen App
@graph.description: Shopify app that allows tag pages to be edited with content and meta information for SEO optimization

offers.description: Tag page editing and optimization for Shopify stores

@graph.name: Technical SEO Recommendations
@graph.description: List of technical changes recommended for Shopify SEO optimization

itemListElement.name: URL Structure Amendment
itemListElement.description: Changed collection page URLs from /collections/collection-name/product/product-name to /product/name

itemListElement.name: Social Link Optimization
itemListElement.description: Added nofollow tags to social links in footer

itemListElement.name: H Tag Optimization
itemListElement.description: Amended H tags on all pages and removed non-relevant H tags

itemListElement.name: Page Template Creation
itemListElement.description: Provided templates for SEO titles, descriptions, URL strings, and H1 tags for all page types

itemListElement.name: Site Speed Improvement
itemListElement.description: Implemented various site speed optimization techniques

itemListElement.name: Collection and Tag Page Focus
itemListElement.description: Shifted strategy from product-first to collection and tag page optimization approach

@graph.name: Google Search Console Performance Data
@graph.description: Click data filtered for collections and tag pages showing organic traffic growth
